title: S&S Worldwide Color Splash! Liquid Watercolor Paint, 6 Vivid Colors, 1-oz Drip-Dispense Bottles, For All Watercolor Painting, Use to Tint Slime, Clay, Glue, Shaving Cream, Non-Toxic. Pack of 6.
description: Bottles feature extra-small opening for mess-free dispensing and greater portion control. 1-Oz. Bottles. Pack of 6 assorted colors: red, yellow, Blue, green, orange and violet.
